name: Uphill Rush: Slide Jump
description:
Launch your character into the air and try to bounce forever. Try this ultra fun and super simple game that will keep you hooked for hours.

Slide and jump as far as you can in the funniest water park you've ever seen.

Master your skills in this challenging and splashy game. Experience infinite fun with the simple tap and launch gameplay.

Equip your character with the awesome, inflatable watercraft of your choice and begin your mega jumping, endless bouncing, and ultra crazy adventure.

Aim high, jump far, and make a splash as you try to beat your best score and improve your skills while having mega fun!

This simple game will help you kill boredom and improve your aiming skills while having a blast!
Don’t wait! Play it now for FREE!
Fly down water slides as you explore coastal cities and other exciting locations.

Perform mega jumps and bounce forever in the splashiest game of them all.

Features:
- Explore over a dozen awesome locations like the amusement park, Port City, Bay City, and the arctic area.
- Choose one of many awesome, inflatable watercraft that you can customize while on your way to victory!
- Pick your vehicle from a variety of crazy watercraft including: spaceship, rocket, banana, boat, and many more!
- Collect gems and upgrade your experience as you master the game.
- Discover the extra daily challenges, which include an ultra fun mini game.

Don’t wait! Play the ultra splashy game now for FREE. Slide fast, jump high, and bounce forever! Mega fun is just one tap away!


Uphill Rush Slide Jump VIP subscriptions

- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase

- Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original one week package unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period

- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen package weekly

- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings after purchase

- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period

- Please visit http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098 for more information about subscriptions.

- You may turn off the auto-renewal of your subscription via your iTunes Account Settings. However, you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period

- Subscription prices and duration: weekly $4.99, monthly $7.99

__

* Prices are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Pricing Matrix" determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in $ USD
